basics.name: PU JIAO
basics.summary: Ph.D. candidate in Computer Science at the University of Kentucky. Research focuses on high-performance computing, scientific data management and reduction, and deep learning for scientific data compression.

work.summary: Research in HPC and error-controlled lossy compression (QoI preservation, adaptive quantization).
highlights: Publications at VLDB, IPDPS, and HiPC

work.summary: Teaching Assistant for CS216: Intro to Software Engineering Techniques.
highlights: Led lab sessions and office hours

work.company: Missouri University of Science and Technology
work.summary: Developed QoI compression algorithms based on SZ3 and benchmarking tools.

work.company: Missouri University of Science and Technology
work.summary: CFD analysis of UAV ceiling effects; bridge inspection and data processing; seismic modeling with OpenSees.

education.institution: Missouri University of Science and Technology
Institute of Engineering Mechanics, China Earthquake Administration
